# Test Root Memory

This is a test memory for verifying graph traversal functionality.

## Purpose

Used to test BFS/DFS traversal algorithms with multiple link types.

## Related Patterns

- test-child1: Related memory demonstrating RELATED link type
- test-child2: Superseded memory demonstrating SUPERSEDES link type
